Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 1st overall pick, by Minnesota in 2018...
Traded from Minnesota to San Diego on 3/2/2020 (Going to MIN: LF T. Williams Jr.. Going to SDN: CF M. Ott Jr., RF D. Porter, SS D. Leal, P A. Javery Jr.)...
Had first career hit on 4/9/2020, off Enrique Carballo (SF)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/2020, off Raul Guido (COL)...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 4/23/2020...
Injured on 6/19/2020 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2020, hitting .268 with 26 HR, 103 RBI...
